lessonTitleText: The Rich Young Man and Zacchaeus
lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.question: What question did the rich young man ask Jesus?
answers: How can I receive eternal life?
How can I be a disciple?
How can I build a bigger house?

questions.question: When Jesus listed God's commands, what did the rich man say?
answers: I've obeyed them since I was a boy
I don't know any of them
I only follow some of them
I will start obeying them tomorrow

questions.question: What did Jesus tell the rich young man to do?
answers: Sell everything and give it to the poor
Give ten coins to the temple

questions.question: Why was the rich young man sad?
answers: He had many possessions and loved them more than God

questions.question: According to Jesus, how hard is it for a rich person to enter heaven?
answers: Harder than a camel going through the eye of a needle
As easy as walking through a door
Like finding a coin on the ground
Harder than climbing a tall mountain

questions.question: What did Zacchaeus do to see Jesus?
What did Jesus say to Zacchaeus in the tree?
answers: Come down, I'm going to your house today
Wait for me to climb up there

questions.question: What did the people do when Jesus went to Zacchaeus' house?
answers: They grumbled because Jesus was spending time with sinners

questions.question: After meeting with Jesus, what did Zacchaeus do?
answers: He said he would give half his money to the poor and pay back four times what he stole

questions.question: How is it possible for sinners to enter God's kingdom?
answers: God does the impossible â€” Jesus paid our price
